channel.title: Comments for page "Six Regular Furs"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Six Regular Furs"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
basic cowl and regular boots can be distilled back into their base pattern, and then down to 6,5,4,3,2,1 furs.
No real reason for the basic designs, but it's quite helpful for the higher end patterns that require wasteland furs.
